title: Ramo Restaurant and Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Trendy pizzeria and bar in old Beijing frequented by foreigners. On the menu is a vegan pizza, four vegetarian pizzas, a vegetarian burger, grilled veggies on focaccia panini (dairy), potato soup (omit egg upon request), and several salads. Some of the vegetarian items can be veganized - ask. Hosts DJ shows and networking events. Prices are moderate by western standard.
